Articles.Content: An idea that occoured to me during a munar landing was it would be awesome to send this data to my KSS (Kerbin Space Station). I tried taking to the station directly but after two 1/2 hours and two fuel resupply missions i gave up. My thought was that if I have a probe on say the Mun. And i get sci data from the surface. I should get the option to send it to KSC or a part that can store sci and has an antenna. Still have the transmit penalty but then I could process it in my station. Just a thought. What do you think?
